name: ax-addrcl
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr))
comment: Closure law for addition in the real subfield of complex numbers. Axiom 6 of 23 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axaddrcl . Proofs should normally use ~ readdcl instead. (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.)
